Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Lobby extends Object implements Runnable
Models a game lobby.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(Server server, ClientConnection owner, int gameSize, boolean isExpertGame)
      Parameters:
      server - the server object in which the lobby is created.
      owner - the player's connection which created the lobby.
      gameSize - the size of the game handled by the lobby.
      isExpertGame - true if the game handled by the lobby has to be played in expert mode, false otherwise.

  • Method Details

    • getGameSize

      public int getGameSize()
      Returns the size of the game handled by the lobby.
      Returns:
      the size of the game handled by the lobby.

    • getConnectedPlayersToLobby

      public List<ClientConnection> getConnectedPlayersToLobby()
      Returns the list of ClientConnection of the players connected to the lobby.
      Returns:
      the list of ClientConnection of the players connected to the lobby.

    • getCurrentLobbySize

      public int getCurrentLobbySize()
      Returns how many players are connected to the lobby when the method is called.

      E.g. : if the maximum lobby size is 3 and there are 2 players connected which are waiting for the third one, a call to this method will return 2.

      Returns:
      how many players are connected to the lobby when the method is called.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Return whether the lobby is full or not.
      Returns:
      true if the lobby is full, otherwise false.

    • isExpertMode

      public boolean isExpertMode()
      Returns whether the game handled by the lobby is played in expert mode or not.
      Returns:
      true if the game handled by the lobby is played in expert mode, otherwise false.

    • getLobbyName

      public String getLobbyName()
      Returns the name of the lobby.

      With our implementation, the lobby name will always correspond to the nickname of the lobby owner.

      Returns:
      the name of the lobby.

    • getLastJoined

      public String getLastJoined()
      Returns the last client connection which has joined the lobby.
      Returns:
      the last client connection which has joined the lobby.

    • registerClientToLobby

      public void registerClientToLobby(ClientConnection newClient) throws IOException
      Insert a new client into the lobby participants List.

      This method is called when a new player wants to register to the lobby. After the insertion is successfully completed, the method notifies all the others participants the new client connected.

      Parameters:
      newClient - the client connection of the player who wants to join the lobby.
      Throws:
      IOException - if it is not possible to send the message to the clients already connected to the lobby.

    • closeLobby

      public void closeLobby(ClientConnection connectionWhoMadeTheLobbyClose)
      Close the lobby if a player disconnects.
      Parameters:
      connectionWhoMadeTheLobbyClose - client who has disconnected and made the lobby close.

    • broadcastMessage

      private void broadcastMessage(CommunicationMessage.MessageType messageType, Object messageContent, List<ClientConnection> excludedClients)
      Send a message to all the client except the excluded ones.
      Parameters:
      messageType - the type/id of the message which has to be broadcast.
      messageContent - the content of the message which has to be sent.
      excludedClients - a list of excluded clients. The message will not be sent to these clients.

    • run

      public void run()
      When the lobby is full, this method makes the game start.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string to be printed containing all the lobby information.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string to be printed containing all the lobby information.
